original: teṣāṃ tu kṛtsno vākyārthaḥ pratibhedaṃ samāpyate /
analyzed: teṣām tu kṛtsnaḥ vākya arthaḥ pratibhedam samāpyate
vyakta upavyañjanā siddhiḥ arthasya pratipattṛṣu

original: sa vyaktaḥ kramavāñ śabda upāṃśu yam adhīyate /
analyzed: sa vyaktaḥ kramavān śabdaḥ upāṃśu yam adhīyate
akramaḥ tu vitatya iva buddhiḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate
yathā utkṣepa viśeṣe api karma bhedaḥ na gṛhyate
āvṛttau vyajyate jātiḥ karmabhiḥ bhramaṇa ādibhiḥ
varṇa vākya padeṣu evam tulya upavyañjanā śrutiḥ
atyanta bhede tattvasya sarūpā iva pratīyate

original: nityeṣu ca kutaḥ pūrvaṃ paraṃ vā paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: nityeṣu ca kutas pūrvam param vā paramārthataḥ

original: ekasyaiva tu sā śaktir yad evam avabhāsate // 2.22 //
analyzed: ekasya eva tu sā śaktiḥ yat evam avabhāsate  /

original: ciraṃ kṣipram iti jñāne kālabhedād ṛte yathā /
analyzed: ciram kṣipram iti jñāne kāla bhedāt ṛte yathā
bhinna kāle prakāśete sa dharmaḥ hrasva dīrghayoḥ

original: na nityaḥ kramamātrābhiḥ kālo bhedam ihārhati /
analyzed: na nityaḥ krama mātrābhiḥ kālaḥ bhedam iha arhati
vyāvartinīnām mātrāṇām abhāve kīdṛśaḥ kramaḥ

original: tābhyo yā jāyate buddhir ekā sā bhāgavarjitā /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ yā jāyate buddhiḥ ekā sā bhāga varjitā
sā hi sva śaktyā bhinnā iva krama pratyavamarśinī
krama ullekha anuṣaṅgeṇa tasyām yat bījam āhitam
tattva nānātvayoḥ tasya niruktiḥ na avatiṣṭhate
bhāvanā samaye tu etat krama sāmarthyam akramam
vyāvṛtta bhedaḥ yena arthaḥ bhedavān upalabhyate

original: adāni vākye tāny eva varṇās te ca pade yadi /
analyzed: vākye tāni eva varṇāḥ te ca pade yadi
varṇeṣu varṇa bhāgānām bhedaḥ syāt paramāṇu vat

original: bhāgānām anupaśleṣān na varṇo na padaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: bhāgānām an upaśleṣāt na varṇaḥ na padam bhavet
teṣām a vyapadeśya tvāt kim anyat vyapadiśyatām

original: d antaḥśabdatattvaṃ tu bhāgair ekaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: antar śabda tattvam tu bhāgaiḥ ekam prakāśitam

original: m āhur apare śabdaṃ tasya vākye tathaikatām // 2.30 //
analyzed: āhuḥ apare śabdam tasya vākye tathā ekatām
tha bhāgaiḥ tathā teṣām āntaraḥ arthaḥ prakāśyate
asya eva ātmanaḥ bhedau śabda arthau apṛthak sthitau
antar mātra ātmanaḥ tasya śabda tattvasya sarvadā
tasya eva astitva nāstitve sāmarthye samavasthite
saṃpratyaya pramāṇa tvāt padārtha astitva kalpane
padārtha abhyuccaye tyāgāt ānarthakyam prasajyate
rāja śabdena rāja arthaḥ bhinna rūpeṇa gamyate
vṛttau ākhyāta sadṛśam padam anyat prayujyate  /
yathā aśvakarṇaḥ iti ukte vinā eva aśvena gamyate

original: kaś cid eva viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayas tathā // 2.36 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit eva viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayaḥ tathā
vākyeṣu artha antara gateḥ sādṛśya parikalpane

original: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
analyzed: upādāya api ye heyāḥ tān upāyān pracakṣate
upāyānām ca niyamaḥ na avaśyam avatiṣṭhate

original: arthaṃ kathaṃ cit puruṣaḥ kaś cit saṃpratipadyate /
analyzed: artham katham cit puruṣaḥ kaḥ cit saṃpratipadyate

original: saṃsṛṣṭā vā vibhaktā vā bhedā vākyanibandhanāḥ // 2.39 //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ vā vibhaktāḥ vā bhedāḥ vākya nibandhanāḥ

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandho buddhyā prakramyate yadā /
analyzed: saḥ ayam iti abhisaṃbandhaḥ buddhyā prakramyate yadā

original: vākyārthasya tadaiko 'pi varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit // 2.40 //
analyzed: vākya arthasya tadā ekaḥ api varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit
kevalena padena arthaḥ yāvān eva abhidhīyate
vākya stham tāvataḥ arthasya tat āhuḥ abhidhāyakam

original: saṃbandhe sati yat tv anyad ādhikyam upajāyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhe sati yat tu anyat ādhikyam upajāyate
vākya artham eva tam prāhuḥ aneka pada saṃśrayam
sa tu aneka pada sthaḥ api pratibhedam samāpyate
jāti vat samudāye api saṃkhyā vat kalpyate aparaiḥ
sarva bheda ānuguṇyam tu sāmānyam apare viduḥ
tat artha antara saṃsargāt bhajate bheda rūpa tām
bhedān ākāṅkṣataḥ tasya yā pariplavamāna tā
avacchinatti saṃbandhaḥ tām viśeṣe niveśayan

original: kāryānumeyaḥ saṃbandho rūpaṃ tasya na vidyate /
analyzed: kārya anumeyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ rūpam tasya na vidyate
asattva bhūtam atyantam atas tam pratijānate
niyatam sādhane sādhyam kriyā niyata sādhanā
sa saṃnidhāna mātreṇa niyamaḥ saṃprakāśate
guṇa bhāvena sākāṅkṣam tatra nāma pravartate
sādhya tvena nimittāni kriyā padam apekṣate

original: santa eva viśeṣā ye padārtheṣu vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: santaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ ye padārtheṣu vyavasthitāḥ

original: te kramād anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam // 2.49 //
analyzed: te kramāt anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam

original: śabdānāṃ kramamātre ca nānyaḥ śabdo 'sti vācakaḥ /
analyzed: śabdānām krama mātre ca na anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti vācakaḥ

original: kramo hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyaṃ na vidyate // 2.50 //
analyzed: kramaḥ hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyam na vidyate

original: ye ca saṃbhavino bhedāḥ padārtheṣv avibhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca saṃbhavinaḥ bhedāḥ padārtheṣu a vibhāvitāḥ

original: saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣv ayaṃ kramaḥ // 2.51 //
analyzed: saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣu ayam kramaḥ
varṇānām ca padānām ca krama mātra niveśinī

original: padākhyā vākyasaṃjñā ca śabdatvaṃ neṣyate tayoḥ // 2.52 //
analyzed: pada ākhyā vākya saṃjñā ca śabda tvam na iṣyate tayoḥ

original: samāne 'pi tu śabdatve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt /
analyzed: samāne api tu śabda tve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt

original: prativarṇaṃ tv asau nāsti padasyārtham ato viduḥ // 2.53 //
analyzed: prativarṇam tu asau na asti padasya artham atas viduḥ  /

original: yathā sāvayavā varṇā vinā vācyena kena cit /
analyzed: yathā sa avayavāḥ varṇāḥ vinā vācyena kena cit

original: arthavantaḥ samuditā vākyam apy evam iṣyate // 2.54 //
analyzed: arthavantaḥ samuditāḥ vākyam api evam iṣyate  /
anarthakāni apāya tvāt padārthena arthavanti vā
krameṇa uccaritāni āhuḥ vākya artham bhinna lakṣaṇam
nitya tve samudāyānām jāteḥ vā parikalpane
ekasya eka artha tām āhuḥ vākyasya avyabhicāriṇīm
abheda pūrvakāḥ bhedāḥ kalpitāḥ vākya vādibhiḥ
bheda pūrvān abhedān tu manyante pada darśinaḥ
pada prakṛti bhāvaḥ ca vṛtti bhedena varṇyate

original: padānāṃ saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā padāśrayā // 2.58 //
analyzed: padānām saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā pada āśrayā

original: padāmnāyaś ca yady anyaḥ saṃhitāyā nidarśakaḥ /
analyzed: pada āmnāyaḥ ca yadi anyaḥ saṃhitāyāḥ nidarśakaḥ

original: nityas tatra kathaṃ kāryaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇadarśanāt // 2.59 //
analyzed: nityaḥ tatra katham kāryam padam lakṣaṇa darśanāt
prativarṇam asaṃvedyaḥ padārtha pratyayaḥ yathā
padeṣu evam asaṃvedyam vākya arthasya nirūpaṇam
vākya arthaḥ saṃniviśate padeṣu sahavṛttiṣu
yathā tathā eva varṇeṣu padārthaḥ sahavṛttiṣu

original: sūkṣmaṃ grāhyaṃ yathānyena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saha gṛhyate /
analyzed: sūkṣmam grāhyam yathā anyena saṃsṛṣṭam saha gṛhyate

original: varṇo 'py anyena varṇena saṃbaddho vācakas tathā // 2.62 //
analyzed: varṇaḥ api anyena varṇena saṃbaddhaḥ vācakaḥ tathā

original: padasyoccāraṇād artho yathā kaś cin nirūpyate /
analyzed: padasya uccāraṇāt arthaḥ yathā kaḥ cit nirūpyate

original: varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā so 'rthaḥ pratīyate // 2.63 //
analyzed: varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā saḥ arthaḥ pratīyate

original: prāptasya yasya sāmarthyān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: prāptasya yasya sāmarthyāt niyama arthā punar śrutiḥ
tena atyantam viśeṣeṇa sāmānyam yadi bādhyate
yajeta iti tatas dravyam prāptam sāmarthya lakṣaṇam

original: vrīhiśrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhis tathā // 2.65 //
analyzed: vrīhi śrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhiḥ tathā
tasmāt vrīhi tvam adhikam vrīhi śabdaḥ prakalpayet

original: dravyatvam aviruddhatvāt prāptyarthaḥ san na bādhate // 2.66 //
analyzed: dravya tvam a viruddha tvāt prāpti arthaḥ san na bādhate  /
tena ca api vyavacchinne dravya tve sahacāriṇi
asaṃbhavāt tatra anyeṣam adarsanam

original: na ca sāmānyavat sarve kriyāśabdena lakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: na ca sāmānya vat sarve kriyā śabdena lakṣitāḥ

original: viśeṣā na hi sarveṣāṃ satāṃ śabdo 'bhidhāyakaḥ // 2.68 //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ na hi sarveṣām satām śabdaḥ abhidhāyakaḥ
śukla ādayaḥ guṇāḥ santaḥ yathā tatra avivakṣitāḥ
tathā avivakṣā dravya tva sahacāriṇām

original: asaṃnidhau pratinidhir mā bhūn nityasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a saṃnidhau pratinidhiḥ mā bhūt nityasya karmaṇaḥ

original: kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopa ity upapadyate // 2.70 //
analyzed: kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopaḥ iti upapadyate
viśiṣṭā eva kriyā yena vākya arthaḥ parikalpyate

original: dravyābhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyāntaram // 2.71 //
analyzed: dravya abhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyā antaram

original: nirjñātārthaṃ padaṃ yac ca tadarthe pratipādite /
analyzed: nirjñāta artham padam yat ca tad arthe pratipādite

original: pikādi yad avijñātaṃ tat kim ity anuyujyate // 2.72 //
analyzed: pika ādi yat avijñātam tat kim iti anuyujyate
sāmarthya prāpitam yat ca vyakti artham anuṣajyate
śrutiḥ eva anuṣaṅgeṇa bādhikā liṅga vākyayoḥ

original: aprāpto yas tu śuklādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate /
analyzed: a prāptaḥ yaḥ tu śukla ādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate
sa yatna prāpitaḥ vākye śruti dharma vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: abhinnam eva vākyaṃ tu yady abhinnārtham iṣyate /
analyzed: abhinnam eva vākyam tu yadi abhinna artham iṣyate

original: tat sarvaṃ śrutibhūtatvān na śrutyaiva virotsyate // 2.75 //
analyzed: tat sarvam śruti bhūta tvāt na śrutyā eva virotsyate  /
vākyānām samudāyaḥ ca yaḥ eka artha prasiddhaye
sākāṅkṣā avayavaḥ tatra vākya arthaḥ api na vidyate  /

original: prāsaṅgikam idaṃ kāryam idaṃ tantreṇa labhyate /
analyzed: prāsaṅgikam idam kāryam idam tantreṇa labhyate
idam āvṛtti bhedābhyām atra bādha samuccayau  /

original: ūho 'smin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandho 'sya na bādhyat /
analyzed: ūhaḥ asmin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ asya na bādhyat
sāmānyasya atideśaḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ atra atidiśyate

original: arthitvam atra sāmarthyam asminn artho na bhidyate /
analyzed: arthi tvam atra sāmarthyam asmin arthaḥ na bhidyate
śāstrāt prāpta adhikāraḥ ayam vyudāsaḥ asya kriyā antare  /

original: iyaṃ śrutyā kramaprāptir iyam uccāraṇād iti /
analyzed: iyam śrutyā krama prāptiḥ iyam uccāraṇāt iti

original: kramo 'yam atra balavān asmiṃs tu na vivakṣitaḥ // 2.80 //
analyzed: kramaḥ ayam atra balavān asmin tu na vivakṣitaḥ  /
idam para aṅgaiḥ saṃbaddham aṅgānām aprayojakam
prayojakam idam teṣām atrā idam nāntarīyakam  /

original: idaṃ pradhānaṃ śeṣo 'yaṃ viniyogakramas tv ayam /
analyzed: idam pradhānam śeṣaḥ ayam viniyoga kramaḥ tu ayam
sākṣāt asya upakāri idam idam ārāt viśeṣakam
śakti vyāpāra bhedaḥ asmin phalam atra tu bhidyate
saṃbandhāt jñāna bhedaḥ ayam bhedaḥ tatra avivakṣitaḥ
prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ ayam atra tu

original: idaṃ gauṇam idaṃ mukhyaṃ vyāpīdaṃ guru laghv idam // 2.84 //
analyzed: idam gauṇam idam mukhyam vyāpi idam guru laghu idam
bhedena aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ asya bahudhā idam vikalpyate
idam niyamyate asya atra yogya tvam upajāyate
asya vākya antare dṛṣṭāt liṅgāt bhedaḥ anumīyate
ayam śabdaiḥ apoddhṛtya padārthaḥ pravibhajyate
iti vākyeṣu ye dharmāḥ padārtha upanibandhanāḥ

original: te sarve na prakalperan padaṃ cet syād avācakam // 2.87 //
analyzed: te sarve na prakalperan padam ced syāt avācakam  /
avibhakte api vākya arthe śakti bhedāt apoddhṛte
vākya antara vibhāgena yathā uktam na virudhyate
yathā eva ekasya gandhasya bhedena parikalpanā
puṣpa ādiṣu tathā vākye api artha bhedaḥ abhidhīyate
gavaye narasiṃhe ca api eka jñānāt ṛte yathā
bhāgam jāti antarasya eva sadṛśam pratipadyate

original: aprasiddhaṃ tu yaṃ bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati /
analyzed: aprasiddham tu yam bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati
tāvati a saṃvidam mūḍhaḥ sarvatra pratipadyate  /
tathā pika ādi yogena vākye atyanta vilakṣaṇe
sadṛśasya eva saṃjñānam asataḥ arthasya manyate  /

original: ekasya bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedaś ca lakṣyate /
analyzed: ekasya bhāge sādṛśyam bhāge bhedaḥ ca lakṣyate
nirbhāgasya prakāśasya nirbhāgeṇa eva cetasā
tathā eva bhāge sādṛśyam bhāge bhedaḥ avasīyate
bhāga abhāve api vākyānām atyantam bhinna dharmaṇām
rūpa nāśe padānām syāt katham ca avadhi kalpanā
agṛhīta avadhau śabde katham ca arthaḥ vivicyate
saṃsargaḥ iva rūpāṇām śabde anyatra vyavasthitaḥ
nānā rūpeṣu tat rūpam tantreṇa aparam iṣyate  /
tasmin abhede bhedānām saṃsargaḥ upavartate
rūpam rūpa antarāt tasmāt ananyat pravibhajyate  /

original: śāstre pratyāyakasyāpi kva cid ekatvam āśritam /
analyzed: śāstre pratyāyakasya api kva cit eka tvam āśritam

original: pratyāyyena kva cid bhedo grahaṇagrāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ // 2.98 //
analyzed: pratyāyyena kva cit bhedaḥ grahaṇa grāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ

original: ū ity abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prakalpitam /
analyzed: iti abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyam prakalpitam

original: lṛluṭor grahaṇe bhedo grāhyābhyāṃ saha kalpitaḥ // 2.99 //
analyzed: lṛ luṭoḥ grahaṇe bhedaḥ grāhyābhyām saha kalpitaḥ

original: yasyety etad aṇo rūpaṃ saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam /
analyzed: yasya iti etat aṇoḥ rūpam saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam
na hi pratīyamānena grahaṇasya asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: ū ity etad abhinnaṃ ca bhinnavākyanibandhanam /
analyzed: iti etat abhinnam ca bhinna vākya nibandhanam

original: bhedena grahaṇaṃ yasya pararūpam iva dvayoḥ // 2.101 //
analyzed: bhedena grahaṇam yasya para rūpam iva dvayoḥ
plutasya aṅga vivṛddhim ca samāhāram a coḥ tathā

original: vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣv atyantam āśritaḥ // 2.102 //
analyzed: vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣu atyantam āśritaḥ
ardharca ādiṣu śabdeṣu rūpa bhedaḥ kramāt yathā
tantrāt tathā eka śabda tve bhinnānām śrutiḥ anyathā
saṃhitā viṣaye varṇāḥ sva rūpeṇa avikāriṇaḥ
śabda antara tvam yānti iva śakti antara parigrahāt
indriya ādi vikāreṇa dṛṣṭam grāhyeṣu vastuṣu

original: ātmatyāgād ṛte bhinnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa kramaḥ śrutau // 2.105 //
analyzed: ātmatyāgāt ṛte bhinnam grahaṇam sa kramaḥ śrutau
abhidhāna kriyā bhedāt śabdeṣu a vikṛteṣu api
rūpam atyanta bhedena tat eva ekam prakāśate  /

original: ṛco vā gītimātraṃ vā sāma dravyāntaraṃ na tu /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ vā gīti mātram vā sāma dravya antaram na tu

original: gītibhedāt tu gṛhyante tā eva vikṛtā ṛcaḥ // 2.107 //
analyzed: gīti bhedāt tu gṛhyante tāḥ eva vikṛtāḥ ṛcaḥ
upāyāt śruti saṃhāre bhinnānām eka śeṣiṇām
antreṇa uccāraṇe teṣām śāstre sādhu tvam ucyate
parigṛhya śrutim ca ekām rūpa bhedavatām api

original: tantreṇoccāraṇaṃ kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ // 2.109 //
analyzed: tantreṇa uccāraṇam kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ
sarūpāṇām ca vākyānām śāstreṇa a pratipāditam
tantreṇa uccāraṇāt ekam rūpam sādhu upalabhyate
ekasya aneka rūpa tvam nālikā ādi parigrahāt

original: yathā tathaiva tantrāt syād bahūnām ekarūpatā // 2.111 //
analyzed: yathā tathā eva tantrāt syāt bahūnām eka rūpa tā
yathā pada sarūpāṇām vākyānām saṃbhavaḥ pṛthak
tathā vākya antara abhāve syāt eṣām pṛthak artha tā

original: ātmabhedo na cet kaś cid varṇebhyaḥ padavākyayoḥ /

original: varṇena kena cin nyūnaḥ saṃghāto yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ /

original: na cec chabdāntaram asāv anyūnas tena gamyate // 2.214 //

original: saty api pratyaye 'tyantaṃ samudāye na gamyate // 2.216 //

original: gargā ity eka evāyaṃ bahuṣv artheṣu vartate /

original: yathā ca khadiracchede bhāgeṣu kramavāṃś chidiḥ /

original: prādhānyaṃ bahudhā bhāṣye doṣās tu prakriyāgatāḥ // 2.227 //
analyzed: prādhānyam bahudhā bhāṣye doṣāḥ tu prakriyā gatāḥ

original: yam artham āhatur bhinnau pratyayāv eka eva ta /
analyzed: yam artham āhatuḥ bhinnau pratyayau ekaḥ eva te

original: kva cid āha pacantīti dhātus tābhyāṃ vinā kva cit // 2.230 //

original: yathābhyāsaṃ hi vāg arthe pratipattiṃ samīhate /

original: samārambhāc ca bhāvānām ādimad brahma śāśvatam // 2.237 //
analyzed: samārambhāt ca bhāvānām ādimat brahma śāśvatam

original: nārthe na buddhau saṃbandho nivṛtter avatiṣṭhate // 2.241 //

original: kaś cid evārthavāṃs tatra śabdaḥ śeṣās tv anarthakāḥ // 2.245 //

original: pūrvaṃ padeṣv asaṃsṛṣṭo yaḥ kramād upacīyate /

original: ekam āhur anekārthaṃ śabdam anye parīkṣakāḥ /

original: sāmānyam āśrayaḥ śakter yaḥ kaś cit pratipādakaḥ // 2.311 //

original: śabdā vākyasya teṣv artho na rūpād adhigamyate // 2.318 //

original: pratyekaṃ vā samastair vā ṇatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate // 2.387 //

analyzed: svam svam bhojyam vibhāgena prāptam saṃbhūya bhuñjate

original: vākyāntarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ samāptiḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /

analyzed: pūrvasya arthasya tena syāt virodhaḥ saha vā sthitiḥ

original: yathā sādhāraṇe svatvaṃ tyāgasya ca phalaṃ dhane /

original: nārthavattā pade varṇe vākye caivaṃ viśiṣyate /

original: viniyogād ṛte śabdo na svārthasya prakāśakaḥ /

original: satyo vā viparīto vā vyavahāre na so 'sty ataḥ // 2.428 //

tyāga rūpam prahātavye prāpye saṃsarga darśanam

original: āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā // 3.7.135 //
analyzed: āsthitam karma yat tatra dvairūpyam bhajate kriyā
iti saṃpradāna adhikāraḥ
apādāna adhikāraḥ
nirdiṣṭa viṣayam kim cit upātta viṣayam tathā
apekṣita kriyam ca iti tridhā apādānam ucyate

original: saṃyogabhedād bhinnātmā gamir eva bhramir yathā /
analyzed: saṃyoga bhedāt bhinna ātmā gamiḥ eva bhramiḥ yathā
dhruva avadhiḥ apāyaḥ api samavetaḥ tathā adhruve  /

original: dravyasvabhāvo na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate /
analyzed: dravya svabhāvaḥ na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate

original: apāyaviṣayaṃ dhrauvyaṃ yat tu tāvad vivakṣitam // 3.7.138 //
analyzed: apāya viṣayam dhrauvyam yat tu tāvat vivakṣitam

original: saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyaṃ pāte tu vājinaḥ /
analyzed: saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyam pāte tu vājinaḥ
āviṣṭam yat apāyena tasya adhrauvyam pracakṣate

original: ubhāv apy adhruvau meṣau yady apy ubhayakarmaje /
analyzed: ubhau api adhruvau meṣau yadi api ubhaya karma je

original: vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite // 3.7.140 //
analyzed: vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite
meṣa antara kriyā apekṣam avadhi tvam pṛthak pṛthak

original: meṣayoḥ svakriyāpekṣaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // 3.7.141 //
analyzed: meṣayoḥ sva kriyā apekṣam kartṛ tvam ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: abhedena kriyaikā tu dvisādhyā ced vivakṣitā /
analyzed: abhedena kriyā ekā tu dvi sādhyā ced vivakṣitā

original: meṣāv apāye kartārau yady anyo vidyate 'vadhiḥ // 3.7.142 //
analyzed: meṣau apāye kartārau yadi anyaḥ vidyate avadhiḥ  /

original: gatir vinā tv avadhinā nāpāya iti gamyate /
analyzed: gatiḥ vinā tu avadhinā na apāyaḥ iti gamyate

original: vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patatīty evaṃ bhāṣye nidarśitam // 3.7.143 //
analyzed: vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti evam bhāṣye nidarśitam
bheda abhedau pṛthak bhāvaḥ sthitiḥ ca iti virodhinaḥ

original: yugapan na vivakṣyante sarve dharmā balāhake // 3.7.144 //
analyzed: yugapad na vivakṣyante sarve dharmāḥ balāhake
dhanuṣā vidhyati iti atra vinā apāya vivakṣayā

original: karaṇatvaṃ yato nāsti tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ saha // 3.7.145 //
analyzed: karaṇa tvam yatas na asti tasmāt tat ubhayam saha

original: ekaiva vā satī śaktir dvirūpā vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: ekā eva vā satī śaktiḥ dvi rūpā vyavatiṣṭhate
nimittam saṃjñayoḥ tatra parayā bādhyate aparā  /

original: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yaḥ bhī trā ādīnām ca yaḥ vidhiḥ
upātta apekṣita apāyaḥ saḥ abudha pratipattaye
iti apādāna adhikāraḥ
adhikaraṇa adhikāraḥ
kartṛ karma vyavahitām asākṣāt dhārayat kriyām
upakurvat kriyā siddhau śāstre adhikaraṇam smṛtam
upaśleṣasya ca abhedaḥ tila ākā śakaṭa ādiṣu
upakārāḥ tu bhidyante saṃyogi samavāyinām
avināśaḥ guru tvasya pratibandhe svatantra tā
diś viśeṣāt avacchedaḥ iti ādyāḥ bheda hetavaḥ
ākāśam eva keṣām cit deśa bheda prakalpanāt
ādhāra śaktiḥ prathamā sarva saṃyoginām matā

original: idam atreti bhāvānām abhāvān na prakalpate /
analyzed: idam atra iti bhāvānām abhāvāt na prakalpate
vyapadeśaḥ tam ākāśa nimittam saṃpracakṣate  /
kālāt kriyāḥ vibhajyante ākāśāt sarva mūrtayaḥ
etāvān ca eva bhedaḥ ayam abheda upanibandhanaḥ

original: yady apy upavasir deśa- viśeṣam anurudhyate /
analyzed: yadi api upavasiḥ deśa viśeṣam anurudhyate
śabda pravṛtti dharmāt tu kālam eva avalambate
vasatau a prayukte api deśaḥ adhikaraṇam tatas
a prayuktam tri rātra ādi karma ca upavasau smṛtam
iti adhikaraṇa adhikāraḥ
śeṣa adhikāraḥ
saṃbandhaḥ kārakebhyaḥ anyaḥ kriyā kāraka pūrvakaḥ
śrutāyām a śrutāyām vā kriyāyām saḥ abhidhīyate
dviṣṭhaḥ api asau parārtha tvāt guṇeṣu vyatiricyate
tatra abhidhīyamānaḥ san pradhāne api upayujyate  /
nimitta niyamaḥ śabdāt saṃbandhasya na gṛhyate
karmapravacanīyaiḥ tu sa viśeṣaḥ avarudhyate  /
sādhanaiḥ vyapadiṣṭe ca śrūyamāṇa kriye punar
proktā pratipadam ṣaṣṭhī samāsasya nivṛttaye
niṣṭhāyām karma viṣayā ṣaṣthī ca pratiṣidhyate
śeṣa lakṣaṇayā ṣaṣṭhyā samāsaḥ tatra na iṣyate  /
anyena vyapadiṣṭasya yasya anyatra upajāyate

original: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣayāntare // 3.7.161 //
analyzed: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣaya antare

original: prādhānyaṃ svaguṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣatām /
analyzed: prādhānyam sva guṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣa tām
sahayoge sva yoge atas pradhāna tvam na hīyate
iti śeṣa adhikāraḥ
siddhasya abhimukhībhāva mātram saṃbodhanam viduḥ
prāpta ābhimukhyaḥ hi artha ātmā kriyāsu viniyujyate

original: saṃbodhanaṃ na vākyārtha iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbodhanam na vākya arthe iti pūrvebhyaḥ āgamaḥ
uddeśena vibhakti arthāḥ vākya arthāt samapoddhṛtāḥ
vibhakti arthe avyayībhāva vacanāt avasīyatām
anyaḥ dravyāt vibhakti arthaḥ saḥ avyayena abhidhīyate

original: dravyaṃ tu yad yathābhūtaṃ tad atyantaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: dravyam tu yat yathābhūtam tat atyantam tathā bhavet
kriyā yoge api tasya asau dravya ātmā na apahīyate  /

original: tasmād yat karaṇaṃ dravyaṃ tat karma na punar bhavet /
analyzed: tasmāt yat karaṇam dravyam tat karma na punar bhavet
sarvasya vā anyathābhāvaḥ tasya dravya ātmanaḥ bhavet  /
iti sādhana samuddeśaḥ
